oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Bartlett - Newspaper Article
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: music; Bartlett Training School; Westendorf, Thomas P.;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Short newspaper article regarding Thomas P. Westendorf, Bartlett Training School, and the musical training provided the attendees of Shelby County Training School.
